title: Epileptic seizure patterns
brief_description: A brief outline of the historic ideas about epilepsy and a description of modern methods of diagnosis, showing patients undergoing seizures of varying degrees of intensity, during which psychological changes are observed. The convulsions are correlated with an EEG graph.
